name: Nicholas J Olaerts
coverLetter: Been a marijuana connoisseur of sorts for over a decade. I know all the ins and outs of bucking, trimmin, and curing. I worked on a small six light grow in 2011. That was my first experience in "the business". Spent 8 months in Oregon in 2016 and all I did was work on farms. From slicing new clones to finished product would be where I would be useful. My quickest pound I trimmed was a pound of bluedreams in 6 hours.
